name: places/ChIJfzPG7sTZ54kRLMdQjqMo3c0
adrFormatAddress: #5, New York, NY 10009, USA

originalText.text: Dough came highly recommended to me by another musician and now it is my pleasure to recommend him to others! Not only is Doug a highly-skilled professional with a very good ear, he is incredibly patient, easy-going, open-minded, supportive and flexible. When I started recording with Doug, I was mostly focused on the final result, which I was ultimately very pleased with. However, the experience is about the journey as well as the destination and, through working with Doug, I was able to thoroughly enjoy the journey. My songs evolved even more during the process and I had such a wonderful time. He is gifted, professional, knowledgeable, patient, and kind-I couldn't recommend him more highly!

originalText.text:
Doug has a great ear, reasonable rates and makes recordings that sound terrific.

I decided to go with Satellite Sounds after hearing both his rock and classical recordings, as I knew I'd need someone with an ear for both to pull off my two singles.  We had a great recording session - very efficient and professional, and the follow up mixing/mastering sessions demonstrated his skill and sensitivity to the sound I was looking to create.  Doug's an asset to the New Haven music scene, and I look forward to working with him in the future.

originalText.text: Satellite Sounds recorded our early music trio CD on location (in a church), and also mixed and mastered all tracks. We found Doug to be a good communicator, very patient, technically skilled, and sympathetic to our musical intentions. He has an excellent ear for sound quality, yet deferred to our tastes and sensibilities. I would recommend him to all classical or early music performers without question!

text.text: Satellite Sounds recorded our early music trio CD on location (in a church), and also mixed and mastered all tracks. We found Doug to be a good communicator, very patient, technically skilled, and sympathetic to our musical intentions. He has an excellent ear for sound quality, yet deferred to our tastes and sensibilities. I would recommend him to all classical or early music performers without question!

originalText.text: Whenever you work with Satellite Sounds know this, you won't just be another blocked off time slot on a calendar, you'll be Doug's next favorite project.  You will never find someone as devoted to your music, your sound and your vision and that's the reason you should give him a call for your next project.  Satellite Sounds is a rare gem in a field too often littered with over priced studios and under qualified staff.  If you're looking to record anything and want it to sound amazing and also have a great time doing it then I can't recommend this guy enough!

originalText.text:
In the new Pictoral Edition of Merriam-Webster's Dictionary, you'll find Doug's full-page, high-resolution photo next to the following words:

Awesome
Communicative
Courteous
Customer-oriented
Follow-through
Kind
Polite
Respectful
Wizard

Growing up in the Midwest, I was introduced to the stereotype of the rude New Yorker. Doug single-handedly broke me of that fear when I was calling around for quotes. He was the sweetest and most helpful person I had the pleasure of speaking with.

Seriously, if Doug wasn't the owner, I'd be all over his boss to give him a raise and a promotion. He should start a second company doing customer service training.

I can't say enough good things about him, and I highly recommend him for any project you have.

#DougIsAwesome #DougForPresident #AtLeastThePresidentOfAVClub
